revised_title: A New Approach to Treating Fistula Lacrymalis
tldr: The author, Francis-Joseph Hunauld, discusses the common complications and failures of traditional treatments for fistula lacrymalis. He proposes a new approach that involves leaving the communication between the nose and eye unobstructed, allowing air and tears to pass through naturally. This method avoids the use of foreign bodies and allows the body's natural healing process to take place.
